github-desc: Allows embedding the contents of files from [https://www.github.com/ GitHub]
github-par-lang: Defines what lexer to use and affects how the extension highlights the source code.
github-par-start: Defines the starting line number of the code block. The line attribute must be enabled.
github-par-highlight: Specifies which lines should be highlighted. Multiple numbers can be specified using commas.
github-par-inline: Indicates the source code should be inline instead of in block format.
